attributes.action: adopt and enforce acceptable minimum standards for access to and provision of toilet facilities for all pupils in school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment there are NO minimum standards for toilet access or provision at school. children have no rights to go to the toilet,have toilet paper,privacy,warm running water or soap ! 
This is a disgrace .Myson(aged 11) was recently forced to wet himself in class as he was refused the toilet despite telling his teacher he was desperate.
Please help, sign this petition , its time something was done.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "adopt and enforce acceptable minimum standards for access to and provision of toilet facilities for all pupils in school."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12920.asp
